channel.title: Having trouble with importing variable
channel.description:
Now i am using the variable playerName in one of the classes i made right but it cannot find the symbol, i think that playerName variable is in player so i've gotten to Player.playerName but i don't know how to import that to my class here is the code im using playerName with: [code]public static String playerNamePath = "S:/Java/MoparSources/RealmScape/savedGames/"+playerName+".dat";[/code] But it cannot recognise playerName cauld you tell me how i cauld import the variable,
Thanks if you can
Kinda Regards, Zandia

item.title: Having trouble with importing variable

item.description:
@Lin wrote:

Make it extend client.java

item.title: Having trouble with importing variable

item.description:
@Zandia wrote:

Now i am using the variable playerName in one of the classes i made right but it cannot find the symbol, i think that playerName variable is in player so i’ve gotten to Player.playerName but i don’t know how to import that to my class here is the code im using playerName with:

public static String playerNamePath = "S:/Java/MoparSources/RealmScape/savedGames/"+playerName+".dat";

But it cannot recognise playerName cauld you tell me how i cauld import the variable,
